title: INote.Angle
description: Controls the rotation angle of this note.
returns: Rotation angle, in radians, of this note
remarks: The rotation angle of a note must be in the -360  to +360  range. If a value is specified that is outside of the range, the angle wraps around to be mapped back into range. For example, attempting to set this property to a value of 365  would result in the angle being set to 5.
